name: Manikanta Reddy Pasala
title: Software Architect
summary: Software Architect with 14+ years of experience in designing and implementing enterprise-grade distributed systems. Expert in microservices architecture, cloud-native development, and full-stack engineering. Proven track record of leading engineering teams and delivering scalable solutions across retail, POS, and enterprise domains.
highlights: Architected OneShell POS - full-stack POS system with offline-first sync, 80+ table bidirectional sync
Built microservices ecosystem with 20+ services handling retail operations
Implemented MongoDB sharded cluster with Percona Operator on Kubernetes
Designed NATS JetStream based event-driven architecture for real-time sync
Led development of React + Electron desktop POS client with offline capability
Built AI-powered features: OCR receipt scanning, bank statement parsing, AI assistant
Managed Kubernetes infrastructure with ArgoCD GitOps and Tekton CI/CD pipelines
Experience with GraalVM native compilation for fast-startup microservices
